articles.title: Health experts debunk myths on vaping: Does it really help smokers quit? What chemicals are you inhaling? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: E-cigarettes are banned in Singapore and getting caught vaping will get you a hefty fine, but that hasn’t stemmed the rising number of offence cases in recent years. CNA Lifestyle asks doctors and pharmacists all about vaping.
